////							 ANTI-CHEAT SOFTWARE 								////
// Parameters:                                                                        //
//                                                                         			  //
// [ID]int 					= The ID of the object.                                   //
// [NAME (LANG)]string 		= The name of the anti-cheat in the respective language.  //
// [DATE](MONTH) (YEAR) 	= The date when the anti-cheat software is available.     //
// [PRICE]int				= How much the anti-cheat software costs.                 //
// [DEV COSTS]int			= The development costs of the anti-cheat software.       //
//                                                                                    //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
